scripts.build-api-docs: rm -rf api-docs.tmp && mkdir -p api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cp -r docs/api-docs api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i "s/__env__baseURI__/$SERVER_URL/g" api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml && raml2html api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml > api-docs.tmp/docs/index.html
